work.name: Infosys Ltd.
work.summary: Developed and maintained Java backend services & RESTful APIs for HSBC’s PayMe, ensuring high availability/scalability for 3M+ users.
highlights: Designed and developed the HSBC credit card fee feature for PayMe, resulting in $300,000 monthly savings in top-up fees and significantly influencing user payment preference;
Engineered and implemented PayMe’s auto-trigger feature for voucher fulfillment, leading to a notable reduction in customer complaints and a measurable increase in daily P2M transaction volume;
Streamlined web system setup utilizing Angular and key automated SQL tasks, markedly accelerating deployment cycles and enhancing overall team productivity;
Boosted data sync efficiency, reducing process time from 2 hours to 10 minutes, nearly a 90% improvement;
Executed a complete service migration from Azure to AWS, ensuring uninterrupted business continuity.
Skill: Java, Spring Framework, MyBatis, Angular, Redis, Kafka, SQL Server, MySQL, Azure, AWS, Jenkins.

Optimized SQL scripts and leveraged Redis caching, which cut print preview loading time by more than half;
Set up a reliable distributed configuration center with Apollo in a week to accelerate deployment.
